desc: Located in Mason, OH, Premier Window Fashions is your Family-Owned, “One Stop Shop” for custom Blinds, Shades, Shutters, Draperies and Motorization in Cincinnati. We are the #1 window treatment retailer in Cincinnati and all of Ohio. Call 513-777-7739 to schedule your FREE Estimate. Ask about our promotions!

layout.text: CUSTOM CRAFTED BLINDS, SHADES & SHUTTERS SINCE 1999.
